name: Dryerverse
description:
Dryerverse is a simple platformer game created for the Tenth Creative Gams Jam.

Themes were: Trapped, Street Lamp, Hyperspeed, Doors, MenuStain, Space and Fireworks

It's mostly a proof of concept for a web-slinging platformer mechanic.

Created using the Godot engine in under 7 days.

Source code is available at: https://github.com/plexsoup/dryerverse
